title: Information Literacy Competency Enhancement Program for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and experience in data collection within educational settings
context.additional_context: A program emphasizing the enhancement of research-based instructional design capabilities for pre-service language teachers, based on a teacher-librarian collaboration model

learning_goals: Learners can select academic/practical information sources with 80% accuracy based on evaluation criteria
Learners can format reference lists with 100% accuracy according to APA style guidelines
Learners can design language education activities integrating digital/analog information resources with 90% completeness
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
